ctu_text: ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \"Buffalo Entrepreneurship Development Scheme\" was launched by the Fisheries and Animal Resources Development Department, Government of Odisha. The scheme aims to enhance livestock productivity, especially among marginalized farmers, entrepreneurs, or members of SHG who belong to General, SC, ST categories, SHG members, PWD, Women, and Transgender individuals in Odisha. The scheme will cover all 30 districts of the State. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Implementation:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme was implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry & Veterinary Services, Odisha, Cuttack through the Chief District Veterinary Officers & their field functionaries.
